Class cache_lines

  • java.lang.Object
    • cache_lines

  • public class cache_lines
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Rishabh on 9/25/14. This class create the cache lines with the Set Number, Valid Bit, Tag and the Data. The object of this class will be required for every operation. A 2D object will be generated for this class.
